experiences.heading: Nullsec
experiences.para:
- Conducted cybersecurity workshops on Network Forensics and Linux 
- Supported technological requirements such as web development and phishing demonstrations 
- Helped to run events, create CTF questions for events such as Interpoly Lag and Crash, Youth Cyber Exploration Programme and CTF Month.

experiences.heading: Overflow
experiences.para:
- Conducted workshops on Vuejs, Design Patterns, Computer Vision 
- Led the planning and execution of school wide events such as Bytehackz Hackathon, SIG Fiesta 
- In charge of club's administrative matters and record keeping 
- Helped out with Open House, PolyITE Informatics Olympiad
